data.title: GDRI :: Game Developer Research Institute
data.text:
From Game Developer Research Institute

Jump to: navigation, search

ATTENTION: This entry is a WORK IN PROGRESS

This entry is not finished. Please use with caution.

ICOM Simulations, Inc. (incorporated on May 22, 1985) was a software company founded by Tod Zipnick, based in Wheeling and later Buffalo Grove, Illinois. Among its most popular products were the pioneering MacVenture series of point-and-click adventure games and Sherlock Holmes: Consulting Detective.
